channel.title: Remco van Dijk
channel.description: Recent content on Remco van Dijk

item.title: MSc Thesis
item.description: I’m currently doing my Master’s thesis entitled: “Fault Injection Attacks on Trusted Execution for RISC-V Cores” at the CAES group at the University of Twente. Motivation Link to heading As the RISC-V Instruction Set Architecture (ISA) grows in popularity, it becomes a greater target for malicious behavior. When RISC-V cores are deployed in embedded systems (which is currently the main use case), there is often a need for facilitating secure firmware updates over the air, which can be achieved by Trusted Execution.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my personal website. If you’re interested, you can find various articles and information here about myself, projects I’m doing (or have done in the past) and anything else that I might find interesting to put on here. Note that this website is a work in progress. Between writing my Master’s thesis, working as a TA and my personal life, I try to allocate some time each day to various side projects (this website being one of them).

item.title: Contact
item.description: My preferred method of contact is my business email address. My student email address is available for university-related communications, but keep in mind that soon I won’t have access to it anymore. For other socials, please see the buttons on the main page.
